Joshua Danish's Website

Projects: Cities on the Edge of War

This is a bespoke semester-long board and roleplaying game we developed to help undergraduate history students explore the period leading up to and during the Peloponnesian war.

Publications on the Cities on the Edge Project

2021

  • Ryan, Z., Stiso, C., Danish, J., & Robinson, E. (2021). Designing sustained game-based learning environments to engage undergraduate students in history. ISLS Community Report retrieved from https://repository.isls.org//handle/1/6855 [paper]
